entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
